SEARCH
Module brickGame

Package brickGame

package brickGame
  • Class
    Description
    Block
    Block class is responsible for collision detection between the ball and the blocks
    BlockSerializable
    BlockSerializable is used to serialize the game data
    Bonus
    Bonus class is responsible for creating bonuses that award points if collected
    CreateBall
    CreateBall class is responsible for creating a ball and setting its spawn point
    CreateBoard
    CreateBoard class is responsible for controlling probabilities for each kind of block using a random number and for adding them to the blocks array
    GameEngine
    GameEngine is used to is used to handle certain key events
    GameEngine.OnAction
    OnAction is used to update the game when certain key events happen
    GameState
    GameState class is used to store variables and set their initial values
    LoadGame
    LoadGame class is used to load in the state of the game
    LoadSave
    LoadSave class is used to load in saved game values
    Main
    Main function is responsible for starting the game and updating physics upon collision and applying effects if a special block is destroyed
    Paddle
    Paddle class is used to create paddle objects
    PhysicsEngine
    PhysicsEngine class is responsible for controlling the direction which the ball goes, and how it bounces off the paddle and the walls, it also changes the ball's appearance when boosts are active
    RestartGame
    RestartGame class is responsible for resetting the game
    SaveGame
    SaveGame class is responsible for saving the current state of the game
    Score
    Score class is responsible for printing messages when a block is destroyed, or when a heart is deducted, and displaying a win message when the user beats the last level
